data.title: Collider
data.meta_description: The latest and exclusive Primal coverage from Collider.
data.text:
Why 'PRIMAL's Spear and Fang Are the Perfect Man & Beast Duo

Spear and Fang's bond is so strong that it carries this entire series.

Genndy Tartakovsky's 'Primal' Season 2: Why "The Primal Theory" Is an Essential Detour

Apart from the stylized violence, "The Primal Theory" is a far departure from a typical episode in every way.

The Savage Nature of Love in 'Primal'

Primal is a TV series where survival matters — but what happens when love and friendship start to matter more?

'Primal' Season 2 Review: Genndy Tartakovsky's Series Is as Engrossing and Explosive as Ever

One of the most well-crafted and compelling animated series out there continues to thrive in its thrilling second season.

Best New Animated Series of 2019

Who knew that the "next 'Game of Thrones'" would be a viking anime?

The Top 10 Animated Films of 2019, Ranked

From family-friendly blockbusters to indie darlings, these were the best animated movies the past year had to offer.

'Primal' Review & Interview with Genndy Tartakovsky | Saturday Mourning Cartoons

'Primal' airs for five nights in a row on Adult Swim, starting Monday, October 7th at midnight.

Exclusive ‘Primal’ Poster: A Big Game-Hunting Nicolas Cage Targets His Prized Jaguar Prey

The film stars Cage as a hunter trapped on a boat with a jaguar and an assassin.

LaMonica Garrett on Crisis on Infinite Earths, 'Arrow', and Playing the Anti-Monitor

The actor also discusses to be a big part of the final season of ‘Arrow’, making ‘Clemency’, and shares some fun stories from filming ‘The Last Ship’ and ‘Designated Survivor’.

Watch: First Trailer for Genndy Tartakovsky's Bloody New Adult Swim Series 'Primal'

This story centers on the bond between a caveman and a dinosaur, just like the history books said.
